job.title: Data Modeler
job.description:
Data Modeler
Remote, but candidates near NYC/NJ are highly preferred
FIA Tech is a dynamic and growing Software-as-a-Service technology company which supports over 8,000 global finance and trading firms. Our customers depend on our solutions which connect the global futures and derivatives industry for trade processing and regulatory compliance needs.
In partnership with a world-class team, you will be responsible for architecting data models for industry standards, communications protocols, and database schemas.
The Data Modeler will be primarily responsible for transforming the business needs of the industry in general, and FIA Tech customers specifically, into solutions that result in new or enhanced FIA Tech products. This position will work directly with clients to understand their needs regarding services that FIA Tech offers, and work with FIA Tech strategy, development, UX and support teams to deliver solutions that meet industry-wide needs.
